price: 10. Išskyrus tokį kaip išplėšimą vogiant, ir jie persekiojami liepsnojančios ugnies, veriančio ryškumo.
arabic: إِلَّا مَنۡ خَطِفَ ٱلۡخَطۡفَةَ فَأَتۡبَعَهُۥ شِهَابٞ ثَاقِبٞ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: illā man khaṭifa al-khaṭfata fa-atbaʿahu shihābun thāqibun
